page.title: 14Foleshill Road, Coventry.
page.content: Foleshill Road, a wide, busy road with shops on both sides, runs from the centre of Coventry to the outskirts. The multicultural population is reflected in the wide variety of shops and the goods they sell.Asian shop windows display saris in bright colours and glittering sets of jewellery for Asian brides.In the restaurants visitors can try savoury pakoras or samosas or the sweet gulab jaman.The adventurous cook can buy a huge variety of fruits, vegetables and spices. The shoppers come from many countries of the world. Asian and West Indian people meet people from Britain,Europe and the Far East and Africa when shopping on the Foleshill Road, the road where you can buy anything.
